author: kenney
msg: o Put all m2 core dependencies (plexus-container-default and plexus-utils)
under dependencyManagement of m2 and maven-plugins, and removed
versions in all poms having either as a parent.
Used version 1.0.2-SNAPSHOT for plexus-utils as that was used in maven-core
o Bumped maven-archiver version to 2.0-beta-1-SNAPSHOT for maven-ear-plugin

author: baranda
msg: Added rendered and user role attributes to the htmlTag component (and to its div subcomponent, which extends from it). Also reformatted the classes with the myfaces code style.
